post.body: the guy running the bus is being a 'no more room' nazi. If he didn't have such an impressive beard I would hate him more
do itttttttttttttt
any mens peacoats? This one is sold out :(
thankyou, yes it is and I still have quite a bit to go. Also holy crap it's hard to sleep without bending one arm at all.
best gyros in my life but only in the Toledo area
5 of us local ohio photographers pitched in to rent a huge studio place to shoot photo/video. Just got the studio last night
I'm told theres a truck jackknifed on 77N for miles so I hope you're not in that
I only have 3.5 hours to go I'll make it. Just....don't get close to me
i'm gonna try to get those buttons fixed. I dunno if you saw but i was missing my down and right arrow keys heh
life in your way! Props for the lyric drop.
grats mbrothan
MMmmmmmminus the bear
I hate you!
Whatd you get?
Red cross just denied (owned) me cuz I had the flu too recently.
TKG Blooddrive is today.... Guess who forgot they were giving blood today :(
Going to Steve & Berry's right before it goes out of business. Word on the street is I can score a pea coat for under 10bux
TF2 is 10 bucks today on steam. Soooo worth it http://tinyurl.com/6xelnf
http://twitpic.com/sqx5 - Oh btw pic of the tree as far as we got it done.
At j&gs getting some bomb Greek food. My arm is on fire and covered by chicken diapers.
http://twitpic.com/snb1 - Ouch
Whatever channel my family has on right now has had a Jaws marathon on since I woke up. This is pretty serious stuff.
Getting my tattoo worked on at 6. I'd be more excited if it wasn't on my inner bicep and elbow ditch all day. Eeek
10 miles from Toledo. Drive seems much longer in the snow.
Now serving all photo needs under 5giants studio. Scooooore.
Goin to get the photography studio lease signed today at 6. Pretty jazzed. @Dogslayeggs you know what that means
Got the wedding! Also ran into an old friend/co-worker (Matt O of TKG fame) whilst at Arabica. Time to design then go to the studio
About to present some photos to a couple for a wedding. I shoulda told them to look for the tall awkward hairy guy.
Alright I'll admit, I've been slacking. Time to crank the Sufjan Stevens Christmas albums on repeat until Christmas.
Twitter: the new place to tell everyone how cold it is simultaneously with everyone else.
wrapping my presents in the sweetest paper I could find. 'pirates of the carabbean Christmas'
Need to go out and make a portfolio of newest wedding photos for a potential client to view. And reccomendations on what to use to bind them
Sam's Club: Where you can purchase enough toilet paper to last an entire zombie apocalypse for under $20
Late night photoshoot for a band. Woo!
My jeans are now ripped up to my knee. Overall, really good show
Decided on Once Nothing. Driving to New Philly shorly with @aaronvandike
Hmmm do make the trip to Cleveland to fix my MacBook or skip it and go to New Philly to see once nothing?
Just made an appointment for the apple store genius bar tomorrow in Cleveland. Anyone who wants to ride with me tomrrow, let me know.
Just got done with some SEO training at tkg.
Just got done messing with the design (as much as you can do with a single image) of my twitter. Check it out!
